titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an alternate sulfur dioxide removal measurement for advanced coal-based generation technology units under the qualifying advanced coal project credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/25/2006--Introduced. Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the qualifying advanced coal project tax credit to provide an alternate sulfur dioxide removal measurement for advanced coal-based generation technology electric generation units.
